nodes.caption: Performance obstacles TASKS - Accompanying a patient during intra-hospital transport (P1) - Being a preceptor (P2) - Dealing with many family-related issues (P4) ENVIRONMENT - Poor physical work environment (P3) - Poor workspace design (P9) ORGANIZATION - Poor handoffs (P10) - Inadequate information from physicians (P11) TECHNOLOGIES AND TOOLS - Disorganized supplies area (P5) - Seeking for patient charts (P6) - Delay in getting medications from pharmacy (P7) - Equipment-related issues (P8) - Poorly-stocked patient rooms (P12)
Perceived quality and safety of care
